response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I understand its significance to you and would like to extend a special offer to make it more accessible.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000, a price that reflects its true worth while allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a premium compared to other potential buyers. This offer not only ensures you get the best deal but also secures your position as a valued customer of our esteemed company.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
